name: Cat Quest: Pirates of the Purribean
name_original: Cat Quest: Pirates of the Purribean
description: In Cat Quest: Pirates of the Purribean you play as a purrivateer in a freely explorable 2.5D open-world swarming with Pi-rats. You can sail the seas in your ship for treasures galore! But prepare for peril, as the Pirate King aims to hunt you down...
